details:
cut

[kʌt; kʌt]
(cut; cut.ting)

及物动词

【同义字】

chop 用菜刀剁或用斧头砍
hack 乱砍,乱切

~ one's finger
割伤某人的手指
→ cut one's (own) THROAT

我割伤了我的手指
b. [用…]割伤<身体的某部位>[with, on]
She ~ her finger with a knife.
她用小刀割伤了手指
He ~ his hand on a piece of glass.
他被玻璃碎片割伤了手
c. [~ oneself] (不小心) [被…]割伤身体,负伤[with, on]
Be careful not to ~ yourself while shaving.
刮胡子时要小心别割伤自己
I ~ myself on the cheek with my razor.
我不小心被刮胡刀割伤了脸颊
d. 切割…<成…状态>
He ~ the envelope open.
他割开那个信封
2 剪断
a. 剪断<东西>
~ the tape [ribbon]

~ flowers [wheat]

c. 砍伐<木材等>
~ down trees

d. [用…]剪<东西>[with]
~ the string with a pair of scissors

I ~ the cake in two [in half, into halves].

→ cut to PIECES.
f.[从…]砍掉 [剪下,切去] [from,out of]
~ (away) the dead branches from a tree

~ the picture out of a magazine

g. 切给<某人><东西>; 切<东西>给[某人][for]
C~ me another piece of pie.=C~ another piece of pie for me.

(再切给我一块馅饼)

b. 将…剪<成…>

c. 裁剪 <布、衣服>

减低<价格>
